top-page.title:
Better listings mean
better tenants
top-page.desc:
Our simple step-by-step process takes you through the listing creation, 
so you know you’ve included everything potential tenants want to see..

paragraf-one.title: Not just landlords tools, we’re a listing service too

text.desc: Market far and wide. Post rentals with Rentorr and get massive exposure through our Partner Network. Minimize vacancies and save hundreds or thousands of rands in rental income loss.

apply.title: Integrated applications on every listing
apply.text: Get qualified applicants quicker with Rentorr’s integrated applicants. Just make sure you allow tenants to apply from your listings page and our software does the rest. You can even let multiple roommates apply separately, so you know everyone who will be living there.

ready.title: Ready to start using Rentorr
ready.desc: It shouldn’t feel like a second job to live in a rental property. Rentorr was made to simplify the process and help you and your landlord have a better renting experience.
